title: Shiiba-san no Ura no Kao
description:
1. Imouto Hip (The Little Sister's Butt Belongs To Her Older Brother)
As soon as his mother left the house, Kei starts teasing his sister's ass... Enjoy a chapter long of hot anal action! 

2-4. Imouto Lip (Little Sister Lip)
After watching her brother's porn DVD, Miku was eager to try that "thing using the mouth" she just saw. And it won't take long before the brother agrees to be his sister's guinea pig.

5-9. Shiba-san no Ura no Kao 
He had always admired Shiba-san's cool poise, grace and beauty. He dreamed of getting close to her. He never believed the vicious rumors swirling around her, of snickering girls calling her "Mistress." But then one evening he saw Shiba-san arm-in-arm with a middle-aged man. He followed them, hardly believing this was really happening ... only to discover Shiba-san enmeshed in a forbidden love. Yet the next day at school she arranges to meet him in secret; has she discovered he was spying on her?

related.title: Imouto Lip Mayu No Fuyuyasumi Hen
